group_1.textCenter: I didn't have a chance to look when I was@here yesterday...
They sell so many kinds of chocolate!
Which ones should I get? [chara:100151:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100151:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1]Oh!
"Decagon Ball" chocolate!
That's Felicia's for sure! [chara:100151:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:1001511:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*
Hmm, who's next?
"The Biggest and Mightiest Snack of Them@All - Mighty Chocolate!"...?
Well, the size is mighty at least.
I don't know if the taste is going to be @mighty...
But I'm sure...
This is definitely the one for Tsuruno!
Let's see... [chara:100151:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:1001511:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1][chara:100151:mouthOpen_1]Ah!
"Mr. Purrs-a-lot" chocolate!
Mr. Purrs-a-lot is holding a heart-shaped@chocolate! So cute!
This is for Sana!
[chara:100151:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle* It's so much fun finding things@one after another...
Last is...Yachiyo. What would be good@for her?
Bonbons maybe?

"Do I look like a French aristocrat?"@I can just see her saying that... [chara:100151:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:1001511:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_041.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1]Hee hee!
Oh! That's the flyer that was in my bag@yesterday.
Oh, right.
A famous chocolate company is going to do@a special sale here on the 14th.
All the chocolates in the picture look so@fancy...
Yachiyo's in college... And she's a@beautiful model, too...
One of these might be perfect!
Yeah, I'll get one for her!
I should make it in time if I come right@after school lets out.
I hope everyone will be happy this@Valentine's Day...
